title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Weather                Weather       New England weather can be quite unpredictable, so check the regional weather forecasts before you plan your trip. Winters can range in temperature from 20 - 50 degrees Fahrenheit. Summers are quite humid and range in temperature from 60 - 90 degrees Fahrenheit.
